title: FoodSaverSG
description: 2023 • An iOS application that aims to tackle the issue of food wastage in Singapore

title: GiftDuck - Your Gift Buddy
description: 2022 • An iOS application published on the App Store as part of the Swift Accelerator Programme Class'22

title: LifeSync
description: 2023 • An integrated medication system targeted at the elderly and their caretakers using microneedling technology (hardware) and Cloud Storage (software)

title: Solar Soln
description: 2021 • A solar-powered phone charging device to reduce electricity overconsumption in households

title: Web Development using GenAI
description: 2023 • Research paper that entails the development of the rating tool for the DSO LLM Chatbot

title: Evaluation of Drone Detection Technologies
description: 2022 • Academic research paper that compares the YOLOv5 object detection model against other ML models to detect drones and aerial objects more efficiently

title: The Particle Swarm Optimisation (PSO) Algorithm
description: 2023 • Academic research paper that modifies the PSO Algorithm to solve discrete optimisation problems such as the Travelling Salesman Problem and its application in ALBA e-waste routing optimisation in Singapore's E-waste collection scene
